item.title: CVE-2024-0692|2024-03-01T08:55:35.848Z -- SolarWinds -- Security Event Manager
item.description: The SolarWinds Security Event Manager was susceptible to Remote Code Execution Vulnerability. This vulnerability allows an unauthenticated user to abuse SolarWindsâ€™ service, resulting in remote code execution.
